item.title: Books | All Nations Japan
item.description:
Books | All Nations Japan

I Go I go fast. I go slow. I go above. I go below. I don't go. Thus begins a delightful game of hide and seek played out by an enchanting cast of characters. The newest book from Graham Lewis Fleming, offers a wide range of action words and prepositions to help build early readers vocabulary and understanding.

item.title: Gravity MV - ShowGram
item.description:
Gravity MV - ShowGram

A dark and troubled struggle against flesh and soul. The push and pull of desires, hopes and dreams boiling up and flowing over. AN (All Nations) Dance and Theater group produced this music video with ShowGram. The music of ShowGram can be found at http://www.icompositions.com/

item.title: Bits And Pieces - An organic wave of Hoberman Spheres
item.description:
Bits And Pieces - An organic wave of Hoberman Spheres

Currently on show at Berlin's NOME Gallery is the latest work by Nils Völker titled Bits And Pieces. The installation consists out of 108 mass-produced toy spheres hanging in the middle of the exhibition space, individually addressable and controlled, to create organic waves that appear to move throughout the space.
